red"><div class=c-content-box><div class=feature-inner><i class="feature-icon fa fa-tint"></i><h3 class="feature-title">Water Meter Replacements</h3><div class=feature-content><p>City of Floresville water customers: as part of the USDA water system upgrades, we will be replacing water meters across the city. In order to reduce the amount of trapped air (and potential damage to your plumbing) resulting from the change of your water meter, please leave an outside faucet partially open if you plan to be away from your house while your meter change out takes place.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="c-content-box m-forced greenbg"><h1><a href=/community/about-floresville/>Welcome to Floresville!</a></h1><p>Our city has a long history of being a wonderful place to visit and live. The natural beauty of the land, availability of water, and proximity to San Antonio and Eagle Ford Shale, make Floresville a desirable location for residents and businesses.
